name: goody + geiss  - i'm sorry can't get it up but these damn hallucinations keep distracting me
description: goody + geiss  - i'm sorry can't get it up but these damn hallucinations keep distracting me

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=q1=.5+(.1*sin(time*.41)+.05*sin(time*.62)+.05*sin(time*.44));
per_frame_2=q2=.5+(.1*sin(time*.11)+.05*sin(time*.32)+.05*sin(time*.95));
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=bassfix=.05+.01*bass;
per_frame_5=midfix=.05+.01*mid;
per_frame_6=trebfix=.05+.01*treb;
per_frame_7=bassif=if(above(bass_att,1),bassif+bassfix,if(above(bassif,85),0,bassif*.96));
per_frame_8=midif=if(above(mid_att,1),midif+midfix,if(above(midif,.85),0,midif*.96));
per_frame_9=trebif=if(above(treb_att,1),trebif+trebfix,if(above(trebif,.85),0,trebif*.96));
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q11=bassif;
per_frame_12=q12=midif;
per_frame_13=q13=trebif;
per_frame_14=q14=abs(cos(bassif-time));
per_frame_15=q15=abs(cos(midif-time));
per_frame_16=q16=abs(cos(trebif-time));
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=q21=.01*(sin(time*.52)*cos(time*1.31)*sin(time*.8));
per_frame_20=q22=.01*(sin(time*.12)*cos(time*.19)*sin(time*1.29));
per_frame_21=q23=.01*(sin(time*.23)*cos(time*.91)*sin(time*1.1));
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`float2 center=float2(q1,q2);
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 uv2=uv;
warp_7=`uv2.x=uv.x+sin(uv2.x*10);
warp_8=`//uv2.y=uv.y+cos(uv2.y*10);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float2 uv2m=uv2;
warp_11=`uv2m.y+=time*.11;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`float2 uv1 = uv-center;
warp_14=`float2 uv3=float2(atan2(uv1.x,uv1.y), .25/length(uv1));
warp_15=`
warp_16=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`    // mix in img...
warp_19=`    float pic = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv3).xyz;
warp_20=`    float lum = lum(pic);
warp_21=`    float use_it = abs(lum*0.8+0.05 - (roam_sin));
warp_22=`    float LFNoise = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, uv3*0.1 + time*0.01).x*6-2;
warp_23=`    use_it = saturate(1 - use_it*(3+9*rand_preset.x) - LFNoise);
warp_24=`    ret = lerp(ret, pic.x, use_it.x);
warp_25=`
warp_26=`//ret=tex2D(sampler_main, uv2m);
warp_27=`
warp_28=`ret*=float3(.98+q21,.98+q22,.98+q23);
warp_29=`}
warp_30=`
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uvc = uv-.5;
comp_5=`float2 uv1 = uv-float2(q1,q2);
comp_6=`float2 uv1a= uv-float2(q2,q1);
comp_7=`float2 uvm = float2(atan2(uvc.x,uvc.y), 1/length(uvc));
comp_8=`uvm=uv;
comp_9=`
comp_10=`float tun=atan2(uv1a.x,uv1a.y)-12*length(uv1);
comp_11=`tun-=.2*q11-time;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(uvm);
comp_15=`float3 sharp = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm);
comp_16=`float3 fix = GetPixel(frac(uvm));
comp_17=`
comp_18=`float mod = (fix/((1)-cos(tun)));
comp_19=`
comp_20=`float3 fret = (fix-blur-sin(time))*mod;
comp_21=`float3 inv = 1-fret;
comp_22=`
comp_23=`float melt = dot(fret, inv);
comp_24=`
comp_25=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y*.75))*inv+.55*fret;
comp_26=`ret=lerp(ret, inv, 1.5*saturate(melt));
comp_27=`
comp_28=`//ret=GetPixel(uv);
comp_29=`}
